revised_title: Flexure and Torsion of Cylinders with Cross-Sections Bounded by Orthogonal Circular Arcs: A New Family of Solutions
tldr: This article presents a solution for a new family of cross-sections in the flexure and torsion of cylinders. The cross-sections are bounded by arcs of two orthogonal circles, and the authors use conformal transformation methods to obtain the canonical functions. The study provides new insights into the flexure solution and extends the results to lenticular cross-sections, offering formulae for the torsion moment and moment integrals in the flexure problem.
